overview:
Lake Dai – the architect of recycler.com – brings more than a dozen years of interactive product and team management experience to the company. She currently oversees the product management and engineering teams.

Prior to joining recycler.com, Lake oversaw product strategy and development at Authenticlick, an internet start-up with industry-leading SEM optimization solutions. Prior to that, she held varies senior positions with Yahoo!, Alibaba.com, and Apple while covering a wide range of interactive products such as Search, Marketplace, Local Advertising, E-commerce, and consumer products. While at Yahoo!, she received the prestigious Yahoo! Super Star Award twice in her 6-year tenure.

milestones.description: VP of Product, Target Media Partners Interactive (owns recycler.com)
